name: How to ...
info:
* replace files index.html,index.js and index.css from the comments as the ui_knobs node source files
 * open browser window for localhost:1880/ui_knobs
 * activate node-red debug pane
 * play with knobs in UI
 * watch the debug messages
 * read source code in index.html and index.js

name: index.html
info:
UIbuilder + Vue.js + vue-canvas-knob.js for Node-RED

This is a uibuilder example using Vue.js as a front-end library. See the node-red-contrib-uibuilder README for details on how to use UIbuilder.

name: index.js
index.css
about vue-canvas-knob
info:
See complete documentation and code for vue-knob component at:

[GitHub](https://github.com/ambotaku/vue-knob.git)

Use vue-knob as single-file component:
`npm install vue-canvas-knob`

name: vue-knob.js
